name: Riley Exploration Permian, Inc.
description: Riley Exploration Permian, Inc. is an independent oil and natural gas exploration and production company based in the United States, primarily focused on the Permian Basin, one of the most prolific oil and gas regions in the country. Founded in 2016, Riley Exploration is committed to utilizing advanced technology and efficient operational practices to optimize production while maintaining a strong focus on environmental stewardship. The company engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of oil and natural gas properties, leveraging its expertise and strategic partnerships to drive growth and enhance shareholder value. Through its innovative approach, Riley Exploration aims to sustainably increase its reserves and production levels, capitalizing on the rich geological formations of the Permian Basin. The company is dedicated to upholding high safety and environmental standards, ensuring that its operations are conducted responsibly and sustainably. With a team of experienced professionals, Riley Exploration continues to pursue new opportunities for expansion and development in the energy sector, contributing to the energy independence of the United States.
